column1: "description": "The report is prepared on the basis of information collected from reporting State Road Transport Undertakings (SRTUs) for the financial year 2002-03.\r\rThis table contains the physical parameters of reported SRTUs in India in term of Average Fleet Held and Average Fleet Operated
"title": "Download XLS for Physical Performance of SRTUs for the year 2002-03"
